1.name: The Power Cosmic
1.description: Ronan releases the Power Cosmic through his Universal Weapon.

2.name: Ray of Judgment
2.description: Ronan the Accuser pronounces his opponent guilty.

3.name: Kree Execution
3.description: There will be no discussion, no debate. Ronan is the Supreme Accuser of the Kree Empire...and his opponent is the accused.

signature.name: Edict
signature.description: The Supreme Accuser judges the target, punishing them for their use of Buff effects.

description: Judge. Jury. Executioner. Ronan the Accuser is the Head Accuser of the Kree Empire, the right hand of the Supreme Intelligence. He is the ultimate soldier, a strategic genius, and a relentless champion of justice. Wielding the Universal Weapon, Ronan brings his hammer down upon the unjust, wherever they may hide across the cosmos.
